__e: If the police have got the time and money to arrest a boy who has done nothing wrong, - then why don't they have the time and money to solve this campaign? Huh?
You know, I gave a lot of people up and in return, I got this.
I can't arrest anybody for you unless they do something to get arrested.
Have you arrested for what you did.
I cannot confine you to quarters for something you have not yet done.
I'm afraid of being caught for what I did.
You know I didn't kill Murphy. I know you wanted to kill him. I know you thought about killing him.
What's perhaps less your right is arresting people simply for walking in the rain.
Why are you here and not helping the police arrest my client?
But, what's this, I come to ask for help, and my friend gets arrested?
Well, I nearly had sex last night, which isn't actually technically against the law of course, but it was so crap the guy should be arrested anyway.
You're not telling anyone. If you do, I'll stop her heart forever.
What do you think about getting out and feeling a few collars?
Sorry, love, but isn't that the sort of number you'd want to know before you arrest someone?
Because I'm arresting somebody tonight, and it may as well be you.
Why be in power if you can't haul your enemies in?
[BAINES] I wasn't tryin' to rat your friends out.
But I wouldn't turn my mates in for it.
